Lyrics:
2 ContributorsVirus Lyrics[Intro]
Virus, oh

[Chorus]
The sun goes down, into the ground
The sun goes down, into the ground

[Verse 1]
Prisoner, listener
Is it her, pulling strings and playing puppets?
Vision us, in the cusp
Of a ghost
Now tell me how we can escape this

[Chorus]
The sun goes down, into the ground
The sun goes down, into the ground

[Verse 2]
Integer, similar
Universe, am I one you have forgotten?
Blinding me, silently
Driving me
Into my own self-destruction

[Chorus]
The sun goes down, into the ground
The sun goes down, into the ground
When love is drowned, the virus is crowned
The sun goes down, into the ground

The sun goes down, into the ground
The sun goes down, into the ground
When love is drowned, the virus is crowned

[Outro]
Virus, crisis
Will this ever end?Embed
